title: Fort Necessity National Battlefield: Lodging
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Lodging              Lodging       There is no lodging available inside the park.  For lodging in the area, visit the Laurel Highlands Visitors Bureau. LHVB is the official tourism promotion agency for Fayette County. For a list of campgrounds near fort Necessity, click here .
